Package eu.focusnet.app.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationStatusObserver
    Interface defining behaviour of classes that must be informed of a change in the application status.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CronService
    This class is a service responsible for calling periodic tasks: - retrieving new version of data every N minutes

    Schedulor behavior regarding sleep/wake: - will not wake the device up - we use wake locks to ensure that started tasks are indeed finished - when waking up, the device will wait for Constant.AppConfig#CRON_SERVICE_POLLING_INTERVAL_IN_MINUTES before trying to execute the tasks again - When an execution is triggered, we then make sure we do not execute the sync/clean tasks too often by comparing the last execution time with Constant.AppConfig#CRON_SERVICE_REFRESH_DATA_PERIOD_IN_MINUTES.
    DatabaseAdapter
    The DatabaseAdapater is a facility that helps interacting with the SQLlite database.
    DatabaseAdapter.DatabaseHelper
    Helper class for database management.
    DataManager
    The DataManager is responsible for granting access to resources.
    FocusAppLogic
    This object is the entry point of the mail application logic.
    HttpRequest
    An HTTP request to be issued to the REST server
    HttpResponse
    A response to an HTTP request to the FOCUS platform
    NetworkManager
    This class contains all methods pertaining to networking.
    PriorityTask<T>
    A priority task for our custom priority-based pool

    See http://binkley.blogspot.fr/2009/04/jumping-work-queue-in-executor.html
    PriorityTaskComparator
    Our priority task comparator, used for pooling data retrieval.
    Sample
    A Sample is the object representation of each row in the "samples" local database table
    SampleDao
    SQLite Sample Data Access Object

    All samples being recorded belong to a specific data set id (SampleDao.dataSyncSetId instance variable) that is unique to each DatabaseAdapter being created.
    UserManager
    This class is responsible for handling user-related tasks, such as authentication and access control.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataManager.ResourceOperationStatus
    When performing operations on resources, it may happens that the result is not binary (sucess or failure).
